TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LayoutTransitionType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.LayoutTransitionType Appearing = int32(2)

summary.para: A flag indicating the animation that runs on those items that are appearing in the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.LayoutTransitionType ChangeAppearing = int32(0)

summary.para: A flag indicating the animation that runs on those items that are changing due to a new item appearing in the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.LayoutTransitionType ChangeDisappearing = int32(1)

summary.para: A flag indicating the animation that runs on those items that are changing due to an item disappearing from the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.LayoutTransitionType Changing = int32(4)

summary.para: A flag indicating the animation that runs on those items that are changing due to a layout change not caused by items being added to or removed from the container. This transition type is not enabled by default; it can be enabled via .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.LayoutTransitionType Disappearing = int32(3)

summary.para: A flag indicating the animation that runs on those items that are disappearing from the container.
